          <title>
            <string language="en">Conduction electrons in metals</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Übertragung Elektronen in den Metallen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Électrons de conduction en métaux</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Elétrons da condução nos metais</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Elettroni di conduzione in metalli</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ηλεκτρόνια διεξαγωγής στα μέταλλα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Electrones de la conducción en metales</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This figure illustrates the flow of conduction electrons in metals when connected to a battery.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">metals</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electric current flow</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electron flow</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung veranschaulicht den Fluß der 
Übertragung Elektronen in den Metallen, wenn sie an eine Batterie 
angeschlossen wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette figure illustre l'écoulement des électrons
de conduction en métaux une fois reliée à une batterie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta figura ilustra o fluxo de elétrons da 
condução nos metais quando conectada a uma bateria.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa figura illustra il flusso degli elettroni 
di conduzione in metalli una volta collegata ad una batteria.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτός ο αριθμός επεξηγεί τη ροή των ηλεκτρονίων 
διεξαγωγής στα μέταλλα όταν συνδέονται με μια μπαταρία.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta figura ilustra el flujo de los electrones de 
la conducción en metales cuando está conectada con una batería.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
